description: The Lightning Quilted Jacket is a featherweight insulated jacket that straddles the line between technical outerwear and a casual throw-on for any cool day. It strikes the cold with core-warming 60 gram PrimaLoft® Gold Insulation and features unique “lightning” quilting, front snap closures, and a single button flap pocket to set you apart from the puffy masses at the bar or torta truck.
name: Howler Bros Lighting Quilted Jacket - Mens
